snippet: Houthi forces fired mortar rounds Monday at an oil refinery in the southern Yemeni city of Aden, hitting three full storage tanks.
abstract: Houthi forces fire on oil refinery in Aden, Yemen, hitting storage tanks and starting large fire; United Nations-brokered cease-fire, meant to allow delivery of aid, was foiled by Saudi Arabia, which did not recognize truce and continued airstrikes against Houthis.
lead_paragraph: Houthi forces fired mortar rounds Monday at an oil refinery in the southern Yemeni city of Aden, hitting three full storage tanks.

headline.main: Yemen: Houthis Attack Refinery, Causing Huge Blaze
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: Houthis Attack Refinery, Causing Huge Blaze
